metadata.title: CVE-2024-3958 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions before17.0.6, 17.1 prior to 17.1.4, and 17.2 prior to 17.2.2. An issue was foundthat allows someone  to abuse a discrepancy between the Web applicationdisplay and the git command line interface to social engineer victims intocloning non-trusted code.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
